environnementStep.subtitle: Please ensure to respect the shared places. It is essential to preserve the beauty of the places you will visit.

invitationStep.subtitle: To access the application, you need an invitation from an existing member.

ratingStep.subtitle: Take advantage of ratings and comments from other members to find the highest-rated places and those that best suit your travel preferences.
